name: Pirate Rush Mobile
description:
Pirate Rush

Version: Beta 0.0.1 

note: This game is still a beta build - still in development. Thank you for downloading and testing out. Designed as a mobile game, use an android mobile for best experience. Sometimes PC versions might be outdated.

Pirate Rush is an indie game developed by “Manna Games”. Rush through the endless journey of a pirate among enemy pirates, soilders and golems.

You will earn coins by killing enemy pirates and soilders. Golems will beat you once you hit them. Your pirate will automatically fights when touched.  

You can control the player by swiping (touch or mouse) or using arrow keys.  

There are timely arranged coin rushes when you reach a specific level, double coin and triple coin levels.  

Golem

This greenish monster will kill you when hit. You have three lives, each hit results a loss of a life.  

Slime

Cyan slime will slow you down for a small time period when you run over it. Try to avoid as much as possible.

 

Thanks to,

https://craftpix.net/ for the free game characters and backgrounds.

What’s next?

  • In the future updates, I’ll add functionality to the pirate store and settings.
  • More listings.  

Available for:

  • ANDROID (V Beta 0.0.1)
  • Windows (V Beta 0.0.1)
  • Linux(Ubuntu) (V Beta 0.0.1)
